siteMetadata.title: Ben Lindsay
siteMetadata.subtitle: Musings about data science, tech, and whatever else I feel like

frontmatter.title: Analyzing Larger-than-Memory Data on your Laptop
frontmatter.description: If you want to run some analysis on a dataset that's just a little too big to load into memory on your laptop, but you don't want to leave the comfort of using Pandas dataframes in a Jupyter notebook, then Dask may be just your thing. Dask is an amazing Python library that lets you do all your Pandas-style dataframe manipulations with just a few simple tweaks so you don't have to worry about Jupyter freezing up.
